title: ‘He looks at the receipt and laughs’: Employee with 20+ years of retail experience shuts down a Karen at a Dunkin' while he's trying to get a coffee and donut
description: Sometimes in the morning you want to treat yourself to a little donut and coffee. Good for you! You deserve that little morning treat. So where do you go? Dunkin' Donuts is probably the most well-known place for that kind of thing, so why not there? Oh, maybe because since it's so well-known it attracts all kinds of horrible people, like Karens. *Clouds darken, thunder bangs, lightning strikes* Yup, the dreaded Karen might also be lurking in that spot where you were just trying to start your day off right.  This Karen, however, chose the wrong Dunkin' to throw a tantrum in that morning, because she was doing it right in front of a guy who has worked in retail/costumer service for over 20 years. And, oh boy, was he not having it that morning…
author: Elna McHilderson
excerpt: ‘He looks at the receipt and laughs’: Employee with 20+ years of retail experience shuts down a Karen at a Dunkin' while he's trying to get a coffee and donut - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.

html:
Sometimes in the morning you want to treat yourself to a little donut and coffee. Good for you! You deserve that little morning treat. So where do you go? Dunkin' Donuts is probably the most well-known place for that kind of thing, so why not there? Oh, maybe because since it's so well-known it attracts all kinds of horrible people, like Karens. *Clouds darken, thunder bangs, lightning strikes* Yup, the dreaded Karen might also be lurking in that spot where you were just trying to start your day off right. 

This Karen, however, chose the wrong Dunkin' to throw a tantrum in that morning, because she was doing it right in front of a guy who has worked in retail/costumer service for over 20 years. And, oh boy, was he not having it that morning…
